text: Julio Diamante (27 December 1930 – 1 August 2020) was a Spanish movie director and screenwriter. He directed ten movies between 1959 and 1976. His 1965 movie El arte de vivir was entered into the 15th Berlin International Film Festival. He also directed Sex o no sex. Diamante was born in Cádiz, Spain. Diamante died on 1 August 2020 in Madrid, aged 89.Fallece el director de cine gaditano Julio Diamante, autor de 'Los que no fuimos a la guerra' ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish movie directors Category:Spanish screenwriters
title: Julio Diamante
